overview: On Saturday night (February 11) the Kills celebrated their tenth anniversary in style, with a Live in NYC performance in front of 3,000 fans/party-goers at New York’s Terminal 5. The seething, slithering Mosshart donned pink hair for the occasion, while Hince exuded the rock star confidence of, well, a rock star married to a supermodel, goading the crowd and at times, holding up his guitar like a shotgun. At one point Hince managed to use the mic stand as a guitar slide, much to Mosshart’s delight. The duo was flanked by a quartet of ominous drummers for most of the evening, giving the sound and sights some added grandiosity for the special occasion.  Tracklist: No Wow/Future Starts Slow/Heart Is a Beating/Kissy Kissy/URA Fever/DNA/Satellite/Last Day of Magic/Crazy/Back of the Shell/Black Balloon/Baby Says/You Don’t Own the Road/Tape Sing/Cheap and Cheerful/Pots and Pans/Last Goodbye/Nail in My Coffin/Sour Cherry/Fuck the People/Monkey 23
tagline: The Kills, concert, movie, celebrate, NYC
title: The Kills - 10th Anniversary ‘Live in NYC’
